General.Name: Logisys Inc
General.Description: Logisys Inc. provides maintenance services for domestic financial terminal systems, office equipment, and automated financial machines. It is also involved in ATM failure and cash management, unmanned security, electric vehicle charging infrastructure, and information communication and electrical construction businesses. In addition ,the company offers various products relating to banking system, as well as provides various products for ticket vending machine and unattended payment KIOSK. Further, it offers bus information system products, and security and other solutions. Logisys Inc. was founded in 1996 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
